title: Faites des gosses
overview: Odile and Alexandre lead a quiet life around their three children. Anissa Serge Clement and form a blended family with its ups and downs... Mei and Chang, political refugees, arrived from Beijing six months ago.Nothing predestined these three families to meet ... If not the friendship of their children: Brune, Anouk and Jean-Paul. The links of the children quickly rub off on the adults who all share the same desire to be good parents, in spite of the vagaries of the life. Hard blows, family secrets, unexpected pregnancy, coming out ... Together, they will face with humor and solidarity the surprises (good or bad) that life has in store for them.
